attributes.action: we the citizens of UK demand an immediate general election
attributes.additional_details: call a vote of no confidence in the present government and call a general election
attributes.background: we the citizens of the UK have not voted for the current government administration and they do not have our confidence

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
